Text: What?!? No BrooklynD spouting his homophobic rants about the characters in "White Collar"? I... I don't know what to say. The world is upside down.
Oh BrooklynD, please come back! Entertain us with your right-wing homophobic garbage again! Please let us hear your childish rants about Matthew Bomer just one more time! Oh... how I miss you.....

I watch it cause its a great show.

Now shut the fuck up and seed.
